lines.text: You have a way with elephants.
I want that head to roll in my courtyard!
There is a small trouble, but it is a small trouble several times. Thus it becomes a large touble.
If we face it together, it will only be half as large.
Why would a woman like you want to spend her time in a teak forest?

[to Brecan and Cardigan]
The more I see of you two, the more I like elephants.
